metadata.title: Roman Izmestev - Full-Stack Developer
metadata.description: Roman Izmestev is a full-stack developer specializing in React, Next.js, Shopify, WordPress, and Flutter. 5+ years building websites, eCommerce stores, web apps, and mobile apps for clients worldwide.

cv.description: Professional experience, skills and education of Roman Izmestev, Full-Stack Developer.

hero.name: Roman Izmestev
hero.title: Full-Stack Developer & eCommerce Expert
hero.subtitle: Building digital solutions that drive results. Specializing in website development, eCommerce, mobile and web applications.

about.title: About Me
about.description:
Hey! I'm Roman, a web developer from Vladivostok, Russia.

I build fullstack apps with React and Next.js, mobile apps with Flutter, and websites of any scale — from simple landing pages to complex e-commerce projects on Shopify and WooCommerce.

I'm big on AI-driven development — it helps me ship faster, write cleaner code, and tackle projects that used to be too big for a solo dev.

I work with clients around the globe. I like clear briefs, honest deadlines, and stuff that just works.
about.photoCaption: Me and my beloved co-worker, French Bulldog named Lulu.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of my recent work

services.metaDescription: Web development, eCommerce, and mobile app services by Roman Izmestev. Custom websites with React and Next.js, Shopify stores, Flutter apps, web applications, and more.

items.question: What kind of projects do you work on?
items.answer: I specialize in building websites, web applications, and mobile apps. This includes custom websites using Next.js and React, eCommerce stores on Shopify and WooCommerce, cross-platform mobile apps with Flutter, and internal business systems. Whether you're launching an online store, business website, or creating a mobile app from scratch — I can help.

items.question: Do you work with startups or small businesses?
items.answer: Absolutely. I enjoy working with startups and small/medium businesses, helping them launch scalable and efficient digital solutions within reasonable budgets. Every project gets the same level of attention regardless of size.

items.question: Do you work alone?
items.answer: In most cases, yes — I handle projects end-to-end. However, I collaborate with trusted professionals on certain projects to speed up development and launch. I also leverage AI-driven development tools extensively, which helps me deliver faster while maintaining high code quality.

items.question: What is your development process like?
items.answer: I follow a clear process: Discovery → Design/Prototype → Development → Testing → Launch → Support. Each stage includes regular communication and feedback loops to ensure we're aligned on goals and expectations.

items.question: Do you sign NDAs or contracts?
items.answer: Yes, I'm happy to sign NDAs or provide a contract outlining the project scope, deliverables, and payment terms. Protecting your ideas and establishing clear agreements is important for both parties.

items.question: Do you offer ongoing support and maintenance?
items.answer: Yes, I offer maintenance plans for updates, backups, security patches, and minor content edits. I can also help you get familiar with your freshly launched website or store by providing tailor-made guides and training sessions.

items.question: How is a project paid?
items.answer: I typically take 50% of the project total upon signing a contract, and 50% after the project is completed and approved. For larger projects, we can discuss milestone-based payments.

items.question: What do you need to start a project?
items.answer: Ideally, a brief outlining your goals, branding assets (if available), and any reference sites or apps you like. Don't worry if you don't have everything ready — I'll guide you through the rest during our discovery phase.

hero.name: Roman Izmestev

Specialization in creating websites, eCommerce, web apps & mobile apps

positions.title: Main Technical Engineer
description: Created the whole technical ecosystem of the SaaS platform from scratch
Developed a cross-platform mobile app for end users
Collaborated with third-party providers
Organized internal technical processes

positions.title: eCommerce Store Manager
description: Increased online store sales from 0 to 5,000 AED+ / month
Optimized the website speed and flow of purchase to increase conversions
Re-organized the catalog to make the navigation easier
Launched automated email marketing and increased loyal customer engagement by 80%

positions.title: Customer Support (2nd Line)
description: Provided second-line support for SaaS platform users via chat, email, and phone (English-speaking customers)
Service monitoring. Collaborated closely with Dev and DevOps teams to troubleshoot complex issues and resolve incidents
Onboarded and trained new team members
Wrote internal documentation and support guides for team members

positions.title: Marketing & Advertisement Manager
description: Planned and executed marketing campaigns
Managed partnerships and media relations
Analyzed advertising performance and generated reports

positions.title: Intern of Sales Department
description: Assisted in supply chain operations and procurement
Supported field sales representatives
Used SAP and Excel for inventory and shipment tracking

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Terms and conditions for services provided by Roman Izmestev

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By engaging my services or using this website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use my services.

services.title: Services
services.content: I provide web development, mobile app development, eCommerce solutions, and related digital services. The specific scope, deliverables, and timeline for each project will be outlined in a separate project agreement or proposal.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: Upon full payment, you will own the final deliverables created specifically for your project. I retain the right to use general techniques, skills, and knowledge gained during the project. Third-party assets (fonts, images, plugins) may be subject to their own licenses.

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content: Payment terms are typically 50% upfront and 50% upon project completion, unless otherwise agreed in writing. Invoices are due within 14 days of receipt. Late payments may result in project delays or suspension of services.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.content: I agree to keep confidential any proprietary information shared during our engagement. I am happy to sign a Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA) upon request.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: My liability is limited to the amount paid for services. I am not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of deliverables or services provided.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate the agreement with written notice. Upon termination, payment is due for all work completed up to the termination date.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: I reserve the right to update these terms at any time. Significant changes will be communicated to active clients.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact me at romikizm@gmail.com.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How Roman Izmestev collects, uses, and protects your personal information

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy explains how I collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit this website or engage my services. Your privacy is important to me.

dataCollection.title: Information I Collect
dataCollection.content: I may collect personal information you provide directly, such as your name, email address, and project details when you contact me through the contact form. I also collect basic analytics data about website visits to improve user experience.

dataUse.title: How I Use Your Information
dataUse.content: I use your information to respond to inquiries, provide services, communicate about projects, and improve this website. I will never sell your personal information to third parties.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: This website uses minimal cookies for essential functionality such as theme preferences. No tracking cookies are used for advertising purposes.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: I may use third-party services (such as email providers and analytics tools) that have their own privacy policies. I recommend reviewing their policies as well.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: I implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. To exercise these rights, please contact me directly.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: I may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact me at romikizm@gmail.com.

referral.title: Referral Program
referral.description: Know someone who needs a website or an app? Refer a client — earn up to 10% of the project value.
referral.subtitle: Know someone who needs a website or an app? Refer a client — earn up to 10% of the project value. Straightforward terms, fully transparent.

recommend.title: Make a recommendation
recommend.description: Tell a colleague, friend, or business contact about my services.

contact.title: They get in touch
contact.description: Your referral contacts me and mentions your name. Or give me a heads-up yourself.

work.title: We do the project
work.description: I deliver the work, the client approves and pays.

commission.title: You receive commission
commission.description: As soon as the payment clears, I send your reward — however you prefer.

commission.label: Commission
commission.value:
10% on the first $5,000
5% on anything above

qualifies.label: What qualifies
qualifies.value: Websites, apps, e-commerce, one-off development tasks

recurring.label: Recurring services
recurring.value: Commission paid once for the first month

repeat.label: Repeat business
repeat.value: Client returns with a new project — you earn again

expiration.label: No expiration
expiration.value: Your referral stays valid, even if they reach out months later

calculator.title: Calculate your commission
calculator.belowMinimum: Project value is below the minimum of {amount}

items.question: Do I need to register?
items.answer: No. Just let me know the client is coming from you — before or when they reach out.

items.question: How is the commission paid?
items.answer: Bank transfer, crypto, or cash — your choice.

items.question: What if the client doesn't order right away?
items.answer: The referral stays linked to you, even if they come back months later. The rate applied will be the one in effect when the contract is signed.
